short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cryptocurrency wallet for Tezos blockchain as Web Extension for your Browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Akila is an easy to use cryptocurrency wallet for the Tezos blockchain. Akila sits conveniently  in your browser as a web extension, allowing you to interact with dApps easily & securely. 

Featuring:
-“1 touch” delegation to featured bakers, search by rank, fee, space, or name
-Storing encrypted private keys in the extension’s safe area.
-Creation of new accounts from UI
-Multiple account management
-Switching between Mainnet & Testnet networks
-Ability to explore account actions

-Multiple token standards support (FA1.2, FA2, NFT)
-Public API for DApps
-Unit tests to ensure security and stability of the extension
